promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young rare deer dark-type pokemon wearing regal bracers. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or deer. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Bracervine, a a chibi young rare deer dark-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Fearsome Shadow, Bad News. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "deer", "dark" or "Bracervine". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, deer-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: This elusive woodland sprite lurks in stone fortresses, using Fearsome Shadow to blend with shadows. With its Bad News ability, it turns luck against foes.
